sourcesContent:
import Layout from "../components/layout" import VideoGuide from "../components/videoGuide" import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import fetch from 'node-fetch' const CrossChain = () =>{ const [data, setData] = useState({ ranks: { generals: 0, // > 10 million colonels: 0, // 10 million to 1 million majors: 0, // 1 million to 500 thousand captains: 0, // 500 thousand to 100 thousand lieutenants: 0, // 100 thousand to 50 thousand sergeants: 0 , // 50 thousand to 10 thousand corporal: 0, // 10 thousand to 5 thousand specialist: 0, // 5 thousand to 1 thousand private: 0 // 1 thousand to 500 }, updateTime: Date.now(), }) useEffect(() => { fetch("https://vast-stream-09242.herokuapp.com/") .then(rawData => rawData.json()) .then(json => { setData(json) }) .catch(err => console.log(err)) }, []) return (

Wan Army

Wan Troops Unite!

Rank Comrades WAN Held
General {data.ranks.generals} > 10 million WAN
Colonel {data.ranks.colonels} 10 million to 1 million WAN
Major {data.ranks.majors} 1 million to 500 thousand WAN
Captain {data.ranks.captains} 500 thousand to 100 thousand WAN
Lieutenant {data.ranks.lieutenants} 100 thousand to 50 thousand WAN
Sergeant {data.ranks.sergeants} 50 thousand to 10 thousand WAN
Corporal {data.ranks.corporal} 10 thousand to 5 thousand WAN
Specialist {data.ranks.specialist} 5 thousand to 1 thousand WAN
Private {data.ranks.private} 1 thousand to 500 WAN
) } export default CrossChain
